Macam-macam 'Hantu' di Ekonomi RI
05 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Hendra Kusuma



Jakarta - Belum lama ini khalayak dihebohkan dengan informasi adanya desa fiktif alias 'hantu' yang sengaja dibentuk demi mendapatkan aliran uang program dana desa yang mulai dilaksanakan Pemerintah sejak tahun 2015.Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati yang pertama kali mengungkapkan hal tersebut kepada publik. Dia menceritakan langsung kepada anggota baru Komisi XI DPR pada saat evaluasi kinerja APBN 2019 dan rencana kerja APBN 2020.Namun, sebelum adanya informasi desa 'hantu' penyedot dana desa. Various types of 'Ghosts' in the Indonesian Economy
05 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Hendra Kusuma



Jakarta - Not long ago the public was shocked with information about the existence of a fictitious village alias 'ghost' that was intentionally formed in order to get the flow of money the village fund program that began the Government since 2015. Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati first revealed this to the public. He told directly to the new members of the House of Representatives Commission XI during the evaluation of the 2019 state budget and the 2020 state budget work plan.
